article_title: GOP Leaders Eye Steel Help to Lure Support on Fast-Track Trade Bill
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Senate Republicans are offering a new incentive to support legislation giving the president expanded trade-negotiating power: help for beleaguered steel companies.

American steelmakers are seeking help from the government in response to a flood of imports, saying they are the victims of illegal trade practices. In an effort to recover, the manufacturers have banded together to try to persuade the U.S. International Trade...
